cheatsheet.title: Run Mode On-device Application Debugging using TRK agent

intro.description: Read the following information and follow the related steps to debug programs running on a target device running the Symbian OS.

item.title: Introduction to On-Device Debugging
item.description: Click the question mark (right side) to learn about CODA.

item.title: Preconditions to On-Device Debugging
item.description: Read information related to preconditions to verify and perform before debugging.
